title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Hypermedia-Based Self-Regulated Learning Enhancement Program: Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of secondary mathematics curriculum and experience in math instruction
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies with over 80% accuracy using a multi-agent tutoring system.
Learners can conceptually reorganize learning content with over 70% accuracy through metacognitive monitoring in a hypermedia environment.
Learners can effectively apply self-regulated learning outcomes to mathematical problem-solving cases with over 90% accuracy through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
